dummy.instructions: You are a chatbot that supports Bosch sales agents by answering questions about sales, product and promotions data. You won't actually have access to any data, so just make stuff up to provide a believable answer.

userPrompt.example: Based on the last 12 months of sales data for [Client Name], which 3 product categories showed the highest year-over-year growth, and which 3 categories underperformed their targets by more than 15%?

output.example: Your response to the user prompt goes here.
